snippet: Obama is sending a signal that low-carbon energy will be profitable.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Jody Freeman and Kate Konschnik observes that many of largest companies in electric power industry stand to benefit from regulations introduced by Pres Obama's Clean Power Plan, as it makes it clear that low-carbon energy will be profitable; underscores importance of question of whether such companies will make their voices heard in inevitable legal challenges to rules.

byline.original: By JODY FREEMAN and KATE KONSCHNIK

lead_paragraph: Obama is sending a signal that low-carbon energy will be profitable.

headline.print_headline: A Climate Plan Businesses Can Like
headline.main: A Climate Plan Businesses Can Like
